Sofyan Basir Bebas, Tim JPU KPK akan Pertimbangkan Permohonan Kasasi ke MA
04 Nov 2019, 16:23 by Suhanda


Sofyan Basir Bebas, Tim JPU KPK akan Pertimbangkan Permohonan Kasasi ke MA

KBRN, Jakarta:  Majelis Hakim Pengadilan Tipikor memberikan vonis bebas untuk mantan Direktur Utama PLN, Sofyan Basir.
Tim Jaksa Penuntut Umum KPK, Lie  Putra Setiawan  mengatakan, para jaksa sudah meyakini bahwa Sofyan Basir bersalah dalam melakukan perbantuan melakukan tindak pidana korupsi yang dilakukan Eni Mauani Saragih Johanes Kotjo dan Idrus Marham  dalam korupsi PLTU Riau I."Kami meyakini Sofyan Basir bersalah karena memfasilitasi pemberian suap dari pengusaha Johanes Budisutrisno Kotjo kepada mantan anggota DPR Eni Maulani Saragih dan mantan Mensos Idrus Marham," ungkapnya pada wartawan usai sidang Sofyan Basir di PN Tipikor Jakarta, Senin  (4/11/2019).Dijelaskan Lie, atas putusan bebas majelis hakim PN Tipikor pihaknya akan mempelajari terlebih dahulu langkah hukum selanjutnya."Atas vonis majelis hakim kami akan memikirkan langkah hukum selanjutnya apakah akan melakukan kasasi atau tidak, yang jelas kami pelajari terlebih dahulu putusan dari majelis hakim," jelas Lee.Ia menepis bahwa dakwaan Jaksa Penuntut Umum KPK lemah, sehingga tidak dapat membuktikan bahwa Sofyan Basir bersalah."Kalau putusan itu sepenuhnya hak majelis hakim  jadi bukan berarti dakwaan jaksa lemah , kami sudah membuat surat dakwaan sesuai dengan hasil penyidikan tapi yang jelas kami akan mempelajari dulu pertimbangan pertimbangan majelis dalam putusannya baru akan menyatakan sikap," jelasnya.Putusan vonis bebas ini mengejutkan Tim Jaksa penuntut umum KPK yang telah  menuntut Sofyan Basir  Mantan Direktur Utama PLN, dengan ,  5 tahun penjara dan denda Rp 200 juta subsider 3 bulan kurungan.

Sofyan Basir is free, the KPK prosecutor team will consider an appeal to the Supreme Court
Nov. 04, 2019, 16:23 by Suhanda


Sofyan Basir is free, the KPK prosecutor team will consider an appeal to the Supreme Court

KBRN, Jakarta: The Panel of Judges of the Corruption Court gave an acquittal to the former President Director of PLN, Sofyan Basir.
KPK's Public Prosecutors Team Lie Putra Setiawan said prosecutors were convinced that Sofyan Basir was guilty of assisting in committing acts of corruption committed by Eni Mauani Saragih Johanes Kotjo and Idrus Marham in the corruption of the Riau PLTU I. "We believe Sofyan Basir is guilty of facilitating corruption. giving bribes from businessman Johanes Budisutrisno Kotjo to former DPR member Eni Maulani Saragih and former Social Minister Idrus Marham, "he told reporters after the Sofyan Basir hearing at the Jakarta Corruption Court, Monday (4/11/2019). PN Tipikor it will study the next legal steps first. "On the verdict of the panel of judges we will think about the next legal step whether to appeal or not, we clearly study first the decision of the panel of judges," explained Lee. He dismissed that the Prosecutor's indictment The KPK general is weak, so it cannot prove that Sofyan Basir is guilty. "Kal au decision is entirely the right of the panel of judges so it does not mean that the indictment of the prosecutor is weak, we have made the indictment in accordance with the results of the investigation but clearly we will study the consideration of the panel's deliberations in the ruling and then will state the attitude, "he explained. KPK's public prosecutor who has sued Sofyan Basir Former Managing Director of PLN, with 5 years in prison and a fine of Rp 200 million in 3 months imprisonment.
